title: When will the (Covid-19) postponed exams take place? - Quora

response.answer_text: See, Whenever CBSE Cancels its examination it usually take them some time to reschedule the whole things.And since it is a case of a pandemic exams will take mostly after 31st March and that only when situation become all okay in India. So it is as simple as that- when there is an end of corona virus outbreak or when there is a good control over it.
The postponed exams may take place anytime after June provided the situation normalizes.
